items.sentence: I'm not going to the library, but I can take you as far as the station.
It's a bit cold, but it probably isn't worth putting the heater on yet.
With your skills, I'm sure it wouldn't be too hard to find another job.
We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.
Since you have nothing to do with this matter, you don't have to worry.
Tom heard someone speaking French to Mary, but couldn't see who it was.
Do you usually have snow on the ground on Christmas Day where you live?
If we don't find water that we can drink, we won't survive much longer.
Tom didn't seem to have any trouble convincing Mary to go out with him.
We've been looking for Tom all morning, but we still haven't found him.
